pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prince Edward Island Premier Dennis King | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Prince Edward Island Premier Dennis King to discuss the evolution of COVID-19.

The two leaders reaffirmed their commitment to continued collaboration and coordination between their respective governments to respond to COVID-19. They discussed the measures announced by the Government of Canada to support workers and businesses through Canada’s COVID-19 Economic Response Plan. As with all organizations, COVID-19 is having an impact on CBC/Radio-Canada’s day-to-day operations. The two leaders agreed that Islanders deserve access to local coverage. The Prime Minister committed to having the minister responsible speak with CBC to explore solutions for Islanders given these extraordinary circumstances.

The Government of Canada is taking a whole-of-government, comprehensive, and coordinated approach to respond to COVID-19. The well-being and safety of Islanders and all Canadians is the Government’s top priority.
